The phoenix glided under the saber, striking with both talons at his
opponent's face.

Tyrael: Stupid Decepticon... Even we Tripredacus know that Alpha Trion
is not a master you can elude. You are not free.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/8/03 9:10:27 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> Proudwing500k@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Tyrael: Then your challenge is accepted, Maxima! Come and do your
worst.
> > 
> > He fired a wide beam of concentrated light at her face, trying to
> > blind her and overwhelm her optics.
> 
> The light blinded her for a moment, "Aaahhhhhh!!" as she cringed back a 
> moment, then regained herself as she barely caught sight of him &
started towards 
> him.
> 
> > 
> > Tyrael: So, you really think Alpha Trion has waken you for you to live
> > free? He might be Autobot, but the old geezer is no fool. You are
> > there for a purpose. Even the Tripredacus Council knew that!
> 
> Again, she growled at him. Alpha Trion was one of those she loathed.
He was 
> one of those responsible or so she tagged, for the demise of her
mentor... & 
> one of Megatron's creators... Gamma Quadran. 
> 
> "I belong to no one," she growled at Tyrael. "Least of all Alpha Trion!"
> 
> As to a plan that was in store for her.. she didn't care. She made
her own 
> destiny. & as long as the Decepticons were a major part of it. 
> 
> > 
> > He turned to Hydras.
> > 
> > Tyrael: By the way, Hydras, did you know that we were the ones
> > manipulating the Predacons all along?
> 
> She didn't wait for Hydras' response to him. She wanted this Tripred so 
> terribly, to feel his life fluids dripping through her claws after
she ripped him 
> apart.
> 
> She charged at him with her saber ready to strike. "Best beg to
Primus, you 
> will NEED it!" she growled in hate & loathing. Pure evil dripping
from her 
> voice as her crimson optics glowed. Despite her damage, she went on.
She had to, 
> she must. 
> 
> Swinging her saber hard at his neck, the other ready to jab at his
midsection 
> or block if needed.
